XIII.ii.2.A.1.i
.
Who May Issue Civil Service Preference Letters
A Veterans Service Center Manager (VSCM), Pension Management Center Manager (PMCM), or a designee may issue the letter.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Civil Service Veterans' Preference Letter
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
